body:
Also, I suppose you meant `long stride = THCTensor_(size)(state, self_, 1) + 1`?
For reference, here is the [CPU implementation of `eye`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c#L1994), which uses a similar striding.
body_html:
